DOC.brief_summary: This trial healthy subject assess PUR118 's effect attenuate ozone induce airway inflammation . This trial establish tolerability PUR118 healthy normal volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect PUR118 Ozone Induced Airway Inflammation Healthy Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male non pregnant , non lactate healthy female age 1850 year ; Must able produce acceptable sputum sample induction ; Must respond ozone inhalation > 10 % increase absolute percentage sputum neutrophil total neutrophil ( neutrophils/gram sputum ) must increase least 50 % sputum neutrophil count screening ; Volunteer nonsmoker exsmoker least 12 month ' duration prior screen history le 1 pack per year . Volunteers receive chronic medication oral contraceptive ; Screening force expiratory volume FEV1 < 80 % predict value age , gender , height race and/or FEV1/FVC ration 70 % ; Volunteers significant occupational exposure respiratory irritant toxins Upper respiratory tract infection within 30 day first study day , low respiratory tract infection within last 3 month ; Volunteers take medication may affect respiratory tract within 30 day first study day ; Volunteers history asthma
